Returns: The return result is ignored. Always return false for consistency.
Parameters: ShareActionProvider: The source of the notification.
Intent: The intent for launching the chosen share target.
onShareTargetSelected(android.widget.Sha.Description: Called when a share target has been selected. The client can decide whether to perform some action before the sharing is actually performed.
onShareTargetSelected(android.widget.Sha.FullName: public abstract boolean onShareTargetSelected (ShareActionProvider source, Intent intent)

ClassDesc: Listener for the event of selecting a share target.
